name: S1ParseEN
short_description: The goal of S1ParseEN is to leverage the MSS Code Factory technology to produce a fast generic English language parse structure for population by a future semantic analyzer project.  One goal of the project is to be able to model parsed keywords and link them to lookups from a thesaurus to a foreign language thesaurus, and then vote on the resulting candidates and a syntax bender to a foreign language.  Pure theory, but I think that describes the transform that I want to build under the guise of this seed project.
summary: A manufactured model of a generic English language parser
